author: Staff Reporter
text:
With the City Municipal Corporations budget for the year 2016-17 expected to be presented in the third week of February, Mayor S. Soundappan held discussions with councillors and officials here on Monday.

AIADMK councillors were explained the key features and proposals in the budget and their opinions were sought. Corporation Commissioner K.R. Selvaraj explained the progress of development work undertaken in the corporation limits and also the date of completion of works.

Sources said that completion of road works, existing developmental works would be accorded priority and allocation would be done for it. Since it is not a full scale budget, proposals may not be on thrust areas, said officials.
title: Mayor holds pre-budget session meeting
